snippet.title: Tin Hearts - The Things We Do Official Trailer - Nintendo Switch
snippet.description:
Tin Hearts is coming to Nintendo Switch in 2023! Follow the thought-provoking story of a genius inventor whose story is unraveled through an increasingly elaborate and immersive puzzle game set in an alternate-timeline Victorian universe.

#TinHearts #NintendoSwitch

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun! https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Visit Nintendo.com for all the latest! http://www.nintendo.com/
